001package io.github.ai4ci.flow;
002
003import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Outbreak;
004import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.Updater;
005import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.SimulationExporter;
006import io.github.ai4ci.util.PauseableThread;
007
008/**
009 * Executes a single simulation to completion under supervision by the monitor.
010 * The monitor will throttle running simulations by pausing simulation threads
011 * if memory is getting tight. The executor does the main loop of exporting data
012 * from the simulation (via {@link SimulationExporter}) and then incrementing
013 * the time of the simulation (via
014 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.Updater}).
015 */
016public class SimulationExecutor extends PauseableThread {
017
018        int step = 0;
019        int toStep;
020        SimulationMonitor mon;
021        Outbreak outbreak;
022        Updater updater;
023        SimulationExporter exporter;
024
025        /**
026         * Create a new simulation executor for the given outbreak, exporter and
027         * number
028         *
029         * @param mon      the monitor that will supervise this execution
030         * @param outbreak the outbreak to execute
031         * @param exporter the exporter to use for exporting data during execution
032         * @param toStep   the number of steps to execute (e.g., 100 for 100 days)
033         */
034        public SimulationExecutor(
035                        SimulationMonitor mon, Outbreak outbreak, SimulationExporter exporter,
036                        int toStep
037        ) {
038                super("Simulation runner: " + outbreak.getUrn(), 9);
039                this.mon = mon;
040                this.outbreak = outbreak;
041                this.exporter = exporter;
042                this.toStep = toStep;
043                this.updater = new Updater();
044        }
045
046        @Override
047        public void doLoop() {
048                try {
049                        this.step += 1;
050                        this.exporter.export(this.outbreak);
051                        this.updater.update(this.outbreak);
052                } catch (Exception e) {
053                        this.mon.handle(e);
054                        this.halt();
055                }
056        }
057
058        @Override
059        public boolean isComplete() { return this.step >= this.toStep; }
060
061        @Override
062        public void setup() {
063                // Nothing to do here
064        }
065
066        @Override
067        public void shutdown(boolean completedNormally) {
068                this.exporter.finalise(this.outbreak);
069                this.mon.notifyExecutionComplete(this);
070        }
071
072        @Override
073        public String status() {
074                return String.format(
075                                "%d/%d [%1.0f%%] - %s - %s", this.step, this.toStep,
076                                ((float) this.step) / this.toStep * 100, super.status(),
077                                this.outbreak.getUrn()
078                );
079        }
080}
